items.title: 'It's not racist to want a safer community': NT attorney-general defends CLP crime policies
items.summary: The NT's attorney-general says she is focused on protecting victims regardless of their cultural background and questions allegations that the government's suite of crime reforms is targeting Aboriginal Territorians.

items.title: Bendigo nurses call for hospital mental health hub as ED presentations climb
items.summary: An increase in mental health and drug-related emergencies puts strain on Bendigo hospital's emergency department, prompting calls for a dedicated treatment hub.

items.title: Jane Goodall changed how we thought about chimps. Why did we know so little before?
items.summary: In the chimp world, there was the time before Jane Goodall and the time after. This is the reason we knew so little about the great ape before 1960, according to the woman who dedicated her life to humankind's closest cousins.

items.title: Hollywood director James Cameron opens up on AI, future Terminator films and the Avatar franchise
items.summary: The Hollywood director has been present in the film space for many years but the emergence of AI and its power has him somewhat scared for the future.

items.title: Were you paying attention to this year's NRL season? Test your memory here

items.title: Should we have more federal politicians?

items.title: Nine people killed in violent Kashmir protests that took place during internet blackout

items.title: Sexual predator taught in Brisbane schools for nine years after parents' complaints
items.summary: Even after putting a stop to their abuser's access to students, Alliyah faced an uphill battle to get basic information about what had happened behind the scenes.

items.title: Japan's top contenders for prime minister are an 'Iron Lady' and the son of a former PM
items.summary: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is stepping down as leader after only a year in the role. It has left his party looking for a new face — and the frontrunner options could not be more different.

items.summary: The assailant, who has been shot dead by police, drove a car into people outside a synagogue in northern England before stabbing them.

items.title: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy accuses Russia of raising nuclear risk after Chernobyl power cut
